scene_description_enriched: A man, dressed in a green tunic with fur trim, orange hose on his left leg, and white hose on his right leg, walks through a grassy field. He wears a green cap and carries a leafy branch. A black dagger is tucked into his belt. The background features a stylized tree and a red, star-patterned sky, with a green, rolling hill in the distance. The scene appears to depict a figure engaged in an outdoor activity, possibly related to gathering or carrying vegetation.
scene_interpretation: This scene is likely an allegorical representation of a month or a season, possibly April or May, associated with spring and the reawakening of nature. The man carrying a leafy branch symbolizes the growth and renewal characteristic of this time of year. It could also represent a figure from a pastoral or agricultural context.
